			        Coronavirus/COVID-19 Information
			    
                            COVID-19 Menu
                        Show search box.COVID-19 News & InformationCampus UpdatesCOVID-19 Case DashboardCOVID-19 News & InformationCampus UpdatesCOVID-19 Case Dashboard
                        Self Report a Positive Test
                    To report a positive COVID-19 case, please use the University's self-reporting form.(opens in new window)Current page:  COVID-19
                                        
    		COVID-19 News & Information
    	Vaccine Policy UpdatePer CSU policy, vaccinations and booster shots against COVID-19 are strongly recommended, but no longer required, for students and employees.
				Recent Announcements
			Current EntriesCSU COVID-19 Vaccination Policy UpdateNew COVID-19 Self-Reporting FormAnnouncing the Closure of the On-Campus COVID-19 Testing SiteSee all updates...If You Have Symptoms or Get ExposedAnyone experiencing any coronavirus symptoms, even mild symptoms, should self-isolate and get tested for COVID-19. Anyone who has been exposed should get tested 3-5 days after the last exposure, monitor their symptoms, and wear a mask for 10 days from the last exposure.Anyone who tests positive for COVID-19 should report their case online via our self-reporting form and they will receive an automated email with isolation instructions.Please note the COVID-19 Hotline is no longer accepting phone calls, but you can email covidhotline@csuchico.edu if you have any additional questions.
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
